name: BOOSTEC
description:
❔What is this game?
  • This game is a re-post to Itch.io of one I previously published on GitHub.
  • It's a game created for the manga "Shangri-La Frontier" competition "Shit Game Competition".
  • Engine:Godot(3D)
  • It was supposed to be a game where you control the robot "Fiddler Club" from Shangri-La Frontier, but I missed the deadline!
  • Respect for the PSX title "Armored Core".
🎮Controls
  • WASD:Move
  • JK:Turn
  • Space:Boost
